snippet: HARRIS--Herb, died April 16, 2016. Age 98, RPI '38, IEEE Fellow. Cherished husband of Elaine for 67+ years. Beloved dad to Gail (Jerry) Ellstein, Linda (Jerry Liebermann) Harris, Geoffrey (Stacy) Harris. Wonderful granddad to Josh (Rebecca) Ellstein, Marissa Ellstein, David (Erin) Ellstein, Hunter Harris, Mara Harris, Rebekah Liebermann. Dear brother of Audrey Wiesenfeld. 1/3
